places_with_reviews.name: C.R. Regency
address: No. 27/1 By Pass Road,n Vellore District, opposite Indira Nagar, Krishnapuram, Ambur, Tamil Nadu 635802, India

reviews.text:
Possibly one of the very few hotels in Ambur. The rooms are decent for a short business stay. They have single, double, and triple beds rooms.

No meals are served here however, you have few good restaurants around such as Sai Sangeet which is a good south Indian veg pick for your breakfast.

The hotel is located above a hospital so the parking sometimes might not very easy to get.

This is just a budget hotel, so don't expect a star service. It's decent and definitely a good choice.

It was all good experience
Staff behaviour was fantastic.
Very cordial and helping staff
Definitely a good one for this budget. Rooms are spacious and nearby a vegetarian hotel. Eventhough the rooms are not brand new, One an consider without hesitation.

This hotel in Ambur is ok kind. I had to visit the city and stay for a night. The city has no five star hotels. Based on the reviews I stayed here. The Beds and blankets were not clean. They should maintain hygiene. Bathroom was leaking, ac was running but makes a blast sound every 30 minutes or so. The staff were helpful.

We checked in around 2.30PM on Sunday the 1st May 2022. We have allotted a Room on the fourth floor. No doubt the room was kept clean and tidy. But, unfortunately, drinking water is not provided, Intercom was not working, news paper not provided in the morning, TV not working, though there are 20 plus rooms, parking space provided only for 3 cars. We have to remove some two wheelers and park our car. We just managed because the Rooms were good.

Chanced upon this hidden gem.

Clean, neat, tidy and spacious room.
Courteous reception.
Hot water in bathroom available.
Clean and big bathroom.

Best in accommodation

places_with_reviews.name: Ambur NR Briyani & Kabab Center
address: 95, MC Road, Opposite to BSNL Exchange, Gandhi Nagar, Ambur Plantation R F, Ambur, Tamil Nadu 635802, India

reviews.text:
I love this place... Since years
Its finger licking good .. can't wait to go back again
Small restaurant on the Ambur main road. Good varieties  of kababs both Chicken and Beef. Biriyani and Chicken kabab was too good. Decently maintained.

Once a time this shop was good at all.
Beef biriyani (basmati rice) is my all time favourite.

But nowadays they reduces their both quality and quantity of foods.., biriyani taste was below average.
Beef chilli is good in taste.
At first they provide well cooked basmati rice biriyani with softened meat, but now they use jeera rice .
When you love to  kebab then this shop will satisfy you.

price are average & worth for the quality and quantity of food.
This shop is located in highway service raod.
There was  no parking area, we park our bike in service road but no way to park car here.

Service was good and their ambiance is good enough., They have separate place to dine in with our family.
One of Ambur best kabab centre... They have plenty of choices for you can choose here... And specially green chillies and pepper chillies is best in this restaurant... Am satisfied... #foodie
I tried this shop many years back and got a chance to try again but still the taste remains same. I love this place very yummy must try place in ambur

places_with_reviews.name: SRK Residency
address: No. 79/12-D, Old EB lane, MC Rd, Flower bazar, Ambur, Tamil Nadu 635802, India

reviews.text: We visited this place on 14th Jan, took 2 rooms.Rooms were neat and clean.Ample car parking.Room service was good. Overall nice experience.

Located nearby the Opposite of Ambur railway station walkable distance. Some outside construction is going on. Keeping clean and clear. Room service recommended to improve, intercom phone system not available. So unable to call the room servant for room service. The car parking area and reception lobby everything is perfect.
Good and neat room stay in Ambur main road .. parking is available..
Room, Bathrooms are not clean. No intercom, room service. Car entry height to be reduced, drive carefully else bottom of car will get damaged...

Useless Hotel. Bedsheets are not clean . No room service.  Bathrooms are ugly.  Rooms are totally damaged. the whole hotel itself is in a bad condition. Charging full amount.  I stayed there on Saturday 5th Feb 2022 and vacated on 6th Feb. I suggest others to avoid staying there.

places_with_reviews.name: ARAVIND STAYS
address: ARAVIND STAYS, 3/3C, Bypass road, opposite to Murugan Theatre, Indira Nagar, Ambur, Tamil Nadu 635802, India

reviews.text: One of the best stays in ambur surroundings.  Highly recommended for families and people travelling for business. The ambiance was so cool. The rooms are so clean and neat. Good service and hospitality. The manager was so kind and friendly. The staff are so supportive and friendly. Safe and secure for kids and family. Budget friendly and luxury comfort.

Very neat & good place to stay, highly recommended. Rooms were clean and reception staffs and owner is more friendly type & very supportive.
Well maintained the furnitures and good speed of wifi connection
Saran from Bangalore
Very good place to stay, highly recommended. Rooms were neat and reception staffs very supportive. Would like to visit this place again if I plan my repeat trip to ambur.
Newly constructed Hotel, rooms are big,  neat and clean, Toilet is Moder and clean. Reception staff Satish and Saravanan are friendly. In this area it is very nice hotel. Car parking is available.
Very good place to stay, highly recommended. Rooms were neat and reception staffs very supportive and very helpful and ensured that we are comfortable.

places_with_reviews.name: OYO 30372 Royal Mughal
address: 182, M.C. Road, Ambur Plantation R F, Ambur, Tamil Nadu 635802, India

reviews.text:
The worst rooms that i ever saw, didn't  had the nerve to stay.
The receptionist is so arrogant that the below  pics and seeing them directly  also didn't  made any changes  to his thoughts  about rooms cleanliness..
He still claims the rooms are perfect.

The Worstttttttt!!!!!

First of all, I must say I was lucky that I got this place to stay at the night, because all other hotels were full in Ambur due to wedding season.

But at the same time, I wasn’t happy with the cleanliness. The sheets were dirty and so does the cupboards and racks. There were mosquitoes too. No soap, no toothbrush were provided. Just one shampoo sachet, a bottle of water and towel was provided (which i didn’t use).

If you aren’t particular about the hygiene, then you can opt for this.

Rooms were dirty, the bathroom window was broken, the AC outdoor unit of another room was directly facing to the bathroom window, so it was very hot, and was not able use the bathroom. Also they never care to ask if you are comfortable, they didn't even provide us the drinking water.

Worst place I have stayed. Wrong location marked on map. This is basically a lodge worth less than 500 RS but they charging more than 1300. Bedsheet was very dirty and no replacement when asked for one. OYO has lost all the quality standards. Never trust OYO for the name again. Worst experience

I had stayed in this hotel for one night. There was no good facilities available. They charged RS. 4000 per room but it was not worth even Rs. 2000. Even after lot of discussion, they didn't give any concession.
